reviews.title: Lovely little apartments- great pool
reviews.text: The apartments are fairly basic, but adequate. The pool is fantastic -if a bit cool. Location - outside of main town, lots of places to eat tho.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 10 min walk into main town with loads of bars and restaurants
reviews.title: Liked the Eleni, A Lot
Bliss in Eleni
reviews.text: Bus service to Rhodes- share a taxi with 4 ppl and is about same price but much less hassle and quicker

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beach is nice and water was warm in sept - bit of an uphill walk on the way back!
reviews.title: Loved the Eleni

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: just come back from 2 weeks in Eleni Apartments. We had a lovely stay. The rooms were spacious (by previous Greek standards) and the bathroom was pretty good (shower curtain and bath !) - it still flooded every time we use dit , but heigh ho !
reviews.title: Liked The Apartments

reviews.text: we only had our room cleaned 4 times a week (not 6 as stated in brochure) but it wasnt a problem - we were only supplied with 1 loo roll though, and had to buy more from the supermarket (less than 1 minute walk away) and also some of the towels were a bit threadbare, but its only a 2star property, so youcant expect the ritz!
reviews.title: Wouldn't stay here again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we have just returned from our 2nd visit to Elenis Apartments - this year its being sold in the UK via Thompson as Adults only, however Thompson only have 12 of the 14 rooms here, and the other 2 are private lets by Eleni herself - this year while we were there there WERE children staying - a couple of 16-17 year olds, some 14-15 year olds and a couple of tiny (under 4) depending on who was in the private lets. Also the sign at Flora Supermarket says "all welcome" and also many people have stayed there previously or have friends there, and for a small charge Eleni lets anyone use the pool so some days while we were there it was like a pre school which was noisy & inconvenient. (I can understand why she does it , €4 for a sunbed, €2 for a can of pop or an ice cream - it all mounts up !)
reviews.title: NOT adults only

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Apart from that, we have a lovely time here (again) - the rooms are spaciaous and airy (Thompson still say maid service 6 times a week, but it is only 4) and we only got our sheets & towels changed once in 2 weeks. Air conditioning is very expensive at €12 a day (we did without and it was sweltering, but we managed!).
reviews.title: Good apartments but not great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool was lovely and the gardens nice. We ate at Eleni's barbeque one night and that was nice and good value for money.
reviews.title: Quiet location convenient for Lindos and rest of Rhodes
